meanings.sent1: The glue was agglutinable, making it easy to stick things together.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the agglutinable properties of the substance.
meanings.sent3: The agglutinable glue decided to have a party and stick everything in the room together.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was agglutinable, bringing people together like glue.
meanings.sent5: The concept of teamwork was made clear by the agglutinable nature of the project.

meanings.sent1: The cells were agglutinable, showing a reaction when mixed with the antibodies.
meanings.sent2: The material proved to be agglutinable when tested in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The agglutinable cells threw a party and stuck together in celebration.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was agglutinable, bonding them like cells in a reaction.
meanings.sent5: The idea was agglutinable, coming together perfectly like a scientific experiment.
